profiles.description: Focuses on explaining fundamentals, reasoning behind suggestions, and correcting basic mistakes. Suitable for beginners or players with identified fundamental weaknesses.
Assumes strong fundamentals and focuses on higher-level strategy, macro decisions, and optimizing gameplay. Suitable for experienced players looking for strategic insights.
focus_areas: Advanced teamfight positioning and target selection

profiles.description: Provides only critical, concise alerts and suggestions, minimizing interruptions. Suitable for players who prefer less hand-holding and focus primarily on their own gameplay flow.

Dynamically adjusts the coaching style based on the player's performance, identified weaknesses (via LearningCoach), and game state. Aims to provide the most relevant type of coaching at any given time.
focus_areas: Adjusts detail based on player's success rate with similar past suggestions
May switch between tutor/consultant/minimalist based on game phase or player performance
